p: CoVs demonstrate versatile host ranges and tissue tropism [ 14]. The preliminary attachment of the virion to the host cell is initiated by interactions between the “S” protein and its receptor [ 9]. The sites of the receptor-binding domain (RBD) in the S1 vicinity of a CoV’s “S” protein vary with the virus strain. Some have the RBD at the N-terminus of S1 (MHV) and the others (SARS-CoV) have the RBD at the C-terminus of S1, as noted by the results of the recent research studies [ 5, 39- 40].
